ygData.subject: Oops, forgot one thing
ygData.msgSnippet: As for being tanks... the only thing holding us back from being better tanks than warriors is our hit points.  At lvl 50, I have around 600 to 700 less hps
ygData.messageBody:
As for being tanks... the only thing holding us back from being better tanks
than warriors is our hit points. At lvl 50, I have around 600 to 700 less
hps than a warrior. BUT AC is not that different. Compared to a warrior in
almost full lustrous russet with AC of 829, I, having only 2 pieces of
shiverback (gloves and leggings), have an AC of 810. Plus, as a monk, we
block, dodge and riposte quite a bit more on average than a warrior. Okay, I
think I'm done now.

Kanja
Rodcet Nife
